title: Where Will Credit Suisse's Fine Go?
teaser: This week, the Department of Justice handed Credit Suisse the largest criminal tax penalty ever. $2.6 billion is a lot of money, so NPR's Arun Rath asks the New York Times' Jessica Silver-Greenberg where it all goes.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
